pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## TSD API ClientTransport files and directories, no limits on size or amount, resumable by default, synchronise if needed.## Install```bashpip3 install tsd-api-clientpip3 install tsd-api-client --upgrade # to get the latest version```## taclGet started with `tacl`:```bashtacl --guide configtacl --guide uploadstacl --guide downloadstacl --guide synctacl --guide topics # to see all guides availabletacl --help```Set up shell completion:```sh# for Bash, in ~/.bashrc:eval "$(_TACL_COMPLETE=source_bash tacl)"# for Zsh, in ~/.zshrc:eval "$(_TACL_COMPLETE=source_zsh tacl)"# for Fish, in ~/.config/fish/completions/tacl.fisheval (env _TACL_COMPLETE=source_fish tacl)```
